description: My place is close to The High Line, Billy's Bakery, and Cookshop. You’ll love my place because of Its very rare to have such an amazing outside space , it's very big for a 1 bedroom appt , lots of light and feels like a real home with a huge bathroom and kitchen. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
name: 1 bedroom garden appt in Chelsea New York
review: Beautiful apartment with a spacious private outdoor patio. The apartment is even larger and nicer than the photos suggest. The bedroom is quiet and clean, the living area and kitchen equipped with everything you would need. James was a great host -  very easy to communicate with and accommodating. On a gorgeous and quiet tree lined street in Chelsea, near many restaurants. Highly recommend! Would definitely stay here again.
